system.description: This spell functions like cat's grace, except that it affects multiple creatures. Each target gains a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity and the usual benefits to Dexterity-based skills and Reflex saves.

components.materialDescription: A pinch of cat fur (arcane); divine focus (divine).

system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
